name: Nguyen Hung 2 Hotel
address: Alley 62, No.72 Nguyen Trai, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Well-positioned in Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Nguyen Hung 2 Hotel is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Nguyen Hung 2 Hotel also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Hanoi. The hotel provides 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, family room to ensure our guests the greatest comfort.

The ambiance of Nguyen Hung 2 Hotel is reflected in every guestroom. mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, toiletries, shower are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your reason for visiting Hanoi, the Nguyen Hung 2 Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away.

places.name: Trung Tam Y Te Quan Thanh Xuan
